title: Nano-chitosan boosts sesame plant anti-herbivore defenses and seed nutritional metabolites
content:
Environ. Sci.: Nano, 2024, 11,797-811
DOI: 10.1039/D3EN00402C, Paper
Zhenggao Xiao, Haihua Ji, Le Yue, Feiran Chen, Xiu-Ping Yan, Zhenyu Wang, Sergio Rasmann
Chitosan nanoparticles (CNPs) play an important elicitor role in activating chemical defense of sesame plants against Spodoptera litura and promoting seed nutritional metabolites.
